abstract: A group of shareholders on Thursday suggested that Vodafone give its investors tracking shares representing the company’s 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless.
snippet: A group of shareholders on Thursday suggested that Vodafone give its investors tracking shares representing the company’s 45 percent stake in Verizon Wireless.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 7 — The Vodafone Group, the world’s largest cellphone company, said on Thursday that it had received a letter from a group of shareholders asking it to return as much as £38 billion ($75 billion) to investors in part by spinning off its stake in Verizon Wireless.

headline.main: Vodafone Investors Seek Verizon Wireless Spinoff
headline.print_headline: Vodafone Investors Seek Spinoff of Verizon Wireless
